code:
gantt
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    title MVP Roadmap (6-9 months)
    excludes weekends

    section Phase 0 - Alignment & Design
    Discovery & KPIs          :a0, 2026-02-10, 14d
    Compliance guardrails     :a1, after a0, 7d

    section Phase 1 - Core MVP
    Interop (FHIR/EDI) & Intake :b0, 2026-03-01, 28d
    Rules v0 + RAG v0           :b1, 2026-03-15, 28d
    Auto-Docs & Appeals v0      :b2, 2026-03-22, 21d
    Audit Ledger + Explanations :b3, 2026-03-22, 21d

    section Phase 2 - Pilot Readiness
    Data onboarding (payer+prev):c0, 2026-04-15, 21d
    Dashboards & SLAs           :c1, 2026-04-15, 14d
    Security & HIPAA controls   :c2, 2026-04-15, 21d

    section Phase 3 - Pilot Execution
    Live pilot (service line)   :d0, 2026-05-06, 42d
    Weekly tunning & governance :d1, 2026-05-06, 42d

    section Phase 4 - Scale (Post-MVP)
    State Compliance Engine v1  :e0, 2026-06-17, 28d
    FWA signals (v1)            :e1, 2026-06-17,  28d
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
